title: the Glacial Ravager
intro: Fenrir Vánagandr is a cursed guardian of the high peaks of Jötunheimr. Neither fully giant nor fully beast, he stalks the blizzard-choked passes, hunting those who dare trespass on the sacred frost. He doesn't just kill his prey; he freezes their blood in their veins until they can no longer lift their weapons to resist.

abilities.name: Frost Armour
abilities.details:
Fenrir generates a layer of frost over his fur every now and then. This armour grants him a flat damage reduction against basic attacks and minor magic resistance.

When Fenrir is hit by three basic attacks or a displacement effect by an enemy hero, it shatters, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to nearby enemies and applying three stacks of Frost.

Enemies with Frost have their movement speed reduced, stacking up to eight times.

abilities.name: Glacial Slash
abilities.details:
Fenrir slashes his claws in front of him, dealing magical damage (scaling with physical power and magical power) and applying two additional stacks of Frost on the target.

If the target has five or more stacks, this ability heals Fenrir for a portion of his missing health.

If the target has eight stacks, this ability deals additional magical damage (scaling with magical power and target's maximum health).

abilities.name: Boreal Breath
abilities.details:
Fenrir exhales a blast of freezing wind in a cone for a short duration.

Enemies caught in the breath take magical damage (scaling with magical power) every half of second and have their attack speed reduced.

Each tick of damage also applies a stack of Frost (up to three stacks per ability's full duration).

abilities.name: Snow Ball
abilities.details:
Fenrir conjures a snowball that rolls in a target direction. As it travels, it grows in size, increasing its damage and impact radius.

Upon contact with an enemy hero, it explodes, dealing magical damage (scaling with physical power and magical power) and knocking up enemies hit.

abilities.name: Winter Is Coming
abilities.details:
Fenrir lets out a blood-curdling howl, causing a localised blizzard to swirl around him for a duration, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) and applying a stack of Frost per tick of damage (up to twelve stacks per ability's full duration).

In addition, he gains increased size, range and his Frost Armour cannot be shattered (if Fenrir does not currently have Frost Armour, using this ability instantly grants him the armour).
